(memIssueWidth, intIssueWidth).explanation: Memory issue width and integer issue width are independent design parameters that can be configured separately without one directly causing changes in the other;

(memIssueWidth, nICacheTLBWays).explanation: Memory issue width affects memory operations while instruction cache TLB ways affect instruction fetch, making them independent architectural parameters;

(memIssueWidth, power_pad).explanation: Memory issue width primarily affects execution unit power consumption, while pad power is related to I/O interface design and remains largely independent;
